name: The steel toe boots of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'attack'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'critical'.
